item.title: Getting from hours to outcomes
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The Getting from Hours to Outcomes Learning Materials are for anyone looking to transition from commissioning or delivering care and support by time and task to outcomes led care and support.
What does it do? 

The Getting from Hours to Outcomes Learning Materials explore two support scenarios for the fictional character of Betsy. One scenario asks groups to design support to meet Betsy’s outcomes using a weekly budget and the other scenario asks groups to design support to meet Betsy’s outcomes using an annual budget. When the groups come together they should be able to reflect on the pros and cons of the two scenarios.

How can you use it? 
The Getting from Hours to Outcomes Learning Materials could be used to promote learning within teams of practitioners or individually.
